definitions.definition: The quality of being pleasant or agreeable, whether in respect to situation, climate, manners, or disposition; pleasantness; civility; suavity; gentleness.

definitions.example: We especially enjoyed the amenity of the climate on our last holiday.

definitions.definition: A thing or circumstance that is welcome and makes life a little easier or more pleasant.
definitions.example: All the little amenities the hotel provided made our stay very enjoyable.

definitions.definition: A unit pertaining to the infrastructure of a community, such as a public toilet, a postbox, a library etc.
